Segment.name: ITC
Segment.comment: To specify the results of a general request for information

Field.name: InformationRequestResultCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of results obtained from interview request

Field.name: InformationType
Field.comment: Code specifying the information required in the response

Field.name: InformationStatusCode
Field.comment: A code to indicate the status of information

Field.name: FinancialInformationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating type of financial information

Field.name: ConsolidationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the extent of the consolidation

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: SourceOfDisclosureCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the source of the disclosure information

SyntaxNote.name: C0302
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC03 is present, then ITC02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0402
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC04 is present, then ITC02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E0509
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of ITC05 or ITC09 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: C0605
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC06 is present, then ITC05 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0705
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC07 is present, then ITC05 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0805
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC08 is present, then ITC05 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E1011
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of ITC10 or ITC11 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: L100509
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC10 is present, then at least one of ITC05 or ITC09 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L110509
SyntaxNote.comment: If ITC11 is present, then at least one of ITC05 or ITC09 is required.
